response.original_title: Can Coinbase refund my money help center
response.overview: One of the most common scenarios where users wonder if Coinbase can issue a refund is when they have been scammed or mistakenly sent funds to an incorrect or fraudulent address. 1 ✈ 888 ✈ 634 ✈ 2381 Unfortunately, Coinbase (like all other crypto exchanges) does not provide refunds in these cases, primarily due to the irreversible nature of cryptocurrency transactions, as mentioned above.1 ✈ 888 ✈ 634 ✈ 2381
